participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, enjoys expressing herself through art.
participant_1.background: I work as a waitress. I live in north dakota. I like to draw. I have 5 brothers and sisters.

participant_2.background: My favorite band is rise against. My favorite team is the raptors. I usually go to bed late. I like sports. I am studying to be a dentist.
